mapper.select: SELECT D.* FROM TBL_LUCK_DETAIL D LEFT JOIN TBL_LUCK_GRAB_RECORD G ON D.SEQ = G.LUCK_DETAIL_SEQ WHERE G.LUCK_DETAIL_SEQ IS NULL AND D.LUCK_SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LUCK_GRAB_RECORD G, TBL_LUCK L WHERE L.SEQ = G.LUCK_SEQ AND L.SEQ = #{luckSeq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LUCK WHERE SEQ = #{luckSeq} AND BLESSING_DATE >= (CURRENT_TIME() - INTERVAL ${minutes} MINUTE)
